mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO pay_merchant_bank_cards (pb_mchId,pb_useType,pb_bankCode,pb_bankName,pb_bankAccType,pb_bankCardType,pb_bankReservedPhone,pb_bankCardNo,pb_bankProvince,pb_bankCity,pb_bankLineNo,pb_subBankName,pb_idCardNo,pb_realName,pb_state,pb_createTime,pb_updateTime,pb_isDel) SELECT * FROM (
SELECT #{mchId} as pb_mchId, #{useType} as pb_useType, #{bankCode} as pb_bankCode, #{bankName} as pb_bankName, #{bankAccType} as pb_bankAccType, #{bankCardType} as pb_bankCardType, #{bankReservedPhone} as pb_bankReservedPhone, #{bankCardNo} as pb_bankCardNo, #{bankProvince} as pb_bankProvince, #{bankCity} as pb_bankCity, #{bankLineNo} as pb_bankLineNo, #{subBankName} as pb_subBankName, #{idCardNo} as pb_idCardNo, #{realName} as pb_realName, #{state} as pb_state, #{createTime} as pb_createTime, #{updateTime} as pb_updateTime, #{isDel} as pb_isDel FROM DUAL
) A
mapper.update:
UPDATE pay_merchant_bank_cards
pb_bankCardId = #{bankCardId},
pb_mchId = #{mchId},
pb_useType=#{useType},
pb_bankCode=#{bankCode},
pb_bankName=#{bankName},
pb_bankAccType=#{bankAccType},
pb_bankCardType=#{bankCardType},
pb_bankReservedPhone=#{bankReservedPhone},
pb_bankCardNo=#{bankCardNo},
pb_bankProvince=#{bankProvince},
pb_bankCity=#{bankCity},
pb_bankLineNo = #{bankLineNo},
pb_subBankName=#{subBankName},
pb_idCardNo=#{idCardNo},
pb_realName=#{realName},
pb_state=#{state},
pb_createTime=#{createTime},
pb_updateTime=#{updateTime},
pb_isDel=#{isDel}
WHERE pb_bankCardId = #{bankCardId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM pay_merchant_bank_cards WHERE pb_bankCardId IN
#{bankCardId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from pay_merchant_bank_cards where pb_bankCardId = #{bankCardId}
